overview: Gloria and Alfonso, Alex's parents, show up at their son's room to surprise him for his birthday, but the surprise is theirs when Alfonso discovers a syringe in the sink. Because they are old-fashioned, they begin to speculate that their son is a drug addict or that something serious is wrong with him, but when Àlex discovers them and sees that they are acting suspiciously, he thinks that his parents know the secret that he has been hiding from them for so many years.They discover that their son Alex is hiding something from them, but it is not what they expected.
title: Camello por sorpresa
